commit.message:
flit: improve the --python option

pip --python option can take both the path to a Python executable or the
path to a virtual environment, greatly improving the user experience.

Teach flit to do the same.

commit.message:
deps: Add missing runtime dependency on pip

According to docs https://flit.pypa.io/en/stable/cmdline.html#flit-install:
> Flit calls pip to do the installation.

but pip was not specified as runtime dependency of flit.

Fixes: https://github.com/pypa/flit/issues/646
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Levin <slev@altlinux.org>

verification.payload:
tree 1bb35f6c9d0ee578b220bb892bd444c5a2dc4dea
parent c8ae08dc9f3f067feeec9dfd2c443db592f4d3d1
author Stanislav Levin <slev@altlinux.org> 1684153641 +0300
committer Stanislav Levin <slev@altlinux.org> 1684246594 +0300

deps: Add missing runtime dependency on pip

According to docs https://flit.pypa.io/en/stable/cmdline.html#flit-install:
> Flit calls pip to do the installation.

but pip was not specified as runtime dependency of flit.

Fixes: https://github.com/pypa/flit/issues/646
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Levin <slev@altlinux.org>
